meanings.definition: A symbol consisting of three interlocked spirals.
meanings.sent1: The trisceles on the ancient artifact represented unity and eternity.
meanings.sent2: The trisceles was beautifully engraved on the stone tablet.
meanings.sent3: The trisceles on the shield seemed to dance as the warrior moved.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts intertwined like the trisceles, connecting past, present, and future.
meanings.sent5: The trisceles glowed with a mystical energy, captivating all who gazed upon it.

meanings.definition: A design or pattern featuring three interconnected spirals.
meanings.sent1: The trisceles woven into the tapestry added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The trisceles motif adorned the walls of the ancient temple.
meanings.sent3: The trisceles on the rug seemed to spin when you looked at it closely.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, swirling around like the trisceles.
meanings.sent5: The trisceles pattern was etched into her memory, a reminder of her journey.
